1. Review and analyze the Air Force administrative record submitted to the United States Court of Federal Claims. 2. Review and analyze HBDC’s Motion for Judgment Upon Administrative Record (due February 7, 2012) 3. Consult with SNC’s outside counsel concerning SNC’s opposition to HSDC’s Motion for Judgment Upon Administrative Record and/or in support of SNC’s Motion for Judgment Upon Administrative Record (due February 21, 2012) 4. Prepare and execute necessary Affidavit(s) in connection with the foregoing.
PHASE II: IF MATTER PROCEEDS TO TRIAL
1. Prepare for and provide expert deposition testimony. 2. Consult with SNC’s outside counsel in connection with depositions of HBDC’s fact and expert witnesses. 3. Prepare and provide testimony at trial.
